Sky Force Reloaded

Arcade shoot-’em-up with upgrades and missions; Tesla build works well, but home versions add more progression and events.

Sky Force Reloaded is a modernised shoot-’em-up with polish: upgrading your ship, replaying missions for stars, and chasing high scores. The Tesla version is a great drop-in shooter; the home editions expand progression and events.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Arcade missions with progression.
  • Controller required: No
  • Local co-op: No
  • Plays fine with controller or touch-like inputs.
  • Great quick-shooting Tesla time-killer.

Where to buy / play at home

  • Green Man Gaming
  • Fanatical
  • GOG
  • Humble Store
  • Amazon (Switch / eShop code)
  • Steam
PlatformAvailableKey perks / differences
Tesla Yes Plays fine with controller or touch-like inputs., Great quick-shooting Tesla time-killer.
PC Yes Full campaign with upgrades, Online leaderboards and events
Xbox Yes Console edition with achievements
PlayStation Yes Console edition with trophies
Switch Yes Portable bullet-hell fun
Mobile Yes Free-to-play version with IAP

Cross-saves

  • Tesla → home export supported: No
  • No Tesla → home export.
  • Platform cloud saves keep progression within each ecosystem.

Features

  • Local co-op: No
  • Online co-op (native): No
  • Controller recommended: Yes

Recommended hardware

  • xbox controller
  • ps5 dualsense

Notes

  • Replayable arcade loops; shines with a proper controller at home.
